author: Kathryn Watson
title: Trump wants the country "raring to go by Easter"
description: The president said the "cure" of severe economic slowdown is worse than the "problem" of the deadly virus.
content: President Trump said during a Fox News town hall on Tuesday that he wants the country "back open by Easter" on April 12, signaling impatience with the ongoing business closings, economic slowdown and stock market plunges that are a result of the spreading cor… [+2831 chars]
